DOC.criteria: Male female > great 18 year age On stable dose atorvastatin LDLC > = 115 mg/dL < = 250 mg/dL TG < = 300 mg/dL Women pregnant breastfeeding planning become pregnant Women childbearing potential hysterectomy tuballigation , woman post menopausal , woman practice acceptable method contraception specify protocol BMI > 40 kg/m2 History allergic toxic reaction colesevelam HCl History swallow disorder Any serious disorder could impact conduct study History drug alcohol abuse
